summary: This testimony addresses our earlier work on 2 immigration topics: The U.S. immigration court system , which considers hundreds of thousands of removal cases a year. The case backlog doubled from 2006 through 2015, even as new cases declined. We recommended improving the system's management, including its hiring process.
